headline.main: New Type of Drug for Cholesterol Approved and Hailed as Effective

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Food and Drug Administration yesterday approved for marketing a new type of drug that experts have hailed as the most effective remedy yet devised for lowering cholesterol in the blood.
